resources.string: \"TT Help Me\" is a mobile application designed for Tunisia Telecom subscribers; it helps them to make a clear and detailed reclamation about their problems (problems of connection, phone, fax, etc....). Also it may reduce the waiting delay as it can help subscribers to solve some problems all alone.
User phone Number or paswword was incorrect
this mode is for the majority of users who don\'t have a technical knowledge in telecommunication and electrical engineering .
this mode is for users who have a basic technical knowledge in telecommunication and electrical engineering .
if you have a phone , is there a filter in the main wire (Tunisie Telecom wire)?
Can you describe the internet speed ?
is the ADSL wire ( Rj45) in a good state ?
you must answer all the questions !
New users usually have to wait because installing the wires and configuring the internet for first time take a while .
Usually Internet problem is related to your Internet (Internet Led is not functioning) service provider .
If adsl led is off then the problem is from the phone wire,either from interne installation or externe one.
the filter is absolutely indispensable , you must put a one .
the bad state of the wire is a cause of 45% of Internet problems , so please try to change it.
the slow internet becomes a problem if it is permanent , otherwise it is a temporary problem related to rush hours .
il est probable que votre routeur est en panne
